channel.title: R on OpenForecast
channel.description: Recent content in R on OpenForecast

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello world! Hi everybody! Welcome to the new website dedicated to forecasting with R. This is a mixture of blog and textbooks. The textbook that we currently have on the website is ADAM. This is an ongoing project.
